text:
Ranveer Singh is one actor who knows how to fit in perfectly in the skin of his characters. After acing his role in Simmba, the actor is gearing up for his next big project which is 83, a biopic on Kapil Dev.
Ranveer is all set to essay the role of Kapil Dev in the film.
Viral Bhayani
Singh recently met Kabir Khan, who will be directing the film. Ranveer and Kabir Khan were spotted as they were seen on the cricket ground in Mumbai yesterday. The actor has officially begun his training for the film.

Reports also claim that Kapil Dev himself will be training Ranveer. A bollywoodlife report has quoted a source as saying,
“Ranveer’s cricket coaching will be with Balwinder Singh Sandhu - also a key member of the 1983 World Cup winning squad. While Sandhu and Ranveer will work rigorously to perfect the game, Ranveer will also train with the legend Kapil Dev! Kapil will coach him to perfect his iconic bowling action and Ranveer will work with him to pick up all his mannerisms on and off the field! We can’t wait to see them together hitting the nets!”
A few weeks ago, Singh had spoken about 83. He had said,
“It is an important part of our sports history and history as a nation, our first world cup win and it had put us on top of the world, stamped our presence on the map.” India defeated West Indies, victors of the first two world cups, in the tournament by 43 runs to clinch the trophy.”
title: Kapil Dev To Train Ranveer Singh For His Biopic '83', Preparations Begin On Full Swing!
